attributes.action: To remodel Parliament Square as a Memorial to Queen Elizabeth II.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament Square has no memorial in its centre and therefore provides a site at the heart of the capital where a Memorial can take centre stage rather than trying to integrate a Memorial into other existing settings.
attributes.background: To commission plans to remodel Parliament Square as a Memorial to our Late Sovereign Queen Elizabeth II.   A place of focus between Parliament, Westminster Abbey, the Supreme Court and the Foreign Office.

rejection.details: Parliament Square Garden is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and London Assembly, not the Government or House of Commons.
